attributes.action: undertake a public referendum before signing acceptance, on behalf of the British people, of any treaty relating to the EU constition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The issue of expansion of EU authority over individual sovereign states is a matter of significant public concern at this time. This concern should be recognised and tested by the use of a referendum before Mr Blair considers signing acceptance of further EU constitutional changes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
